name: Lettuce
description: Red leaf lettuce is a highly nutritious food. It’s especially rich in antioxidants and vitamins A and K. Additionally, it may help lower blood pressure, aid weight loss, and boost heart health. Red leaf lettuce can easily be added to your favorite salads or sandwiches for extra flavor and nutrients. [Source: www.healthline.com] Disclaimer: Please note that the image is used for presentation purposes only. Actual product may slightly defer.
